honey glazed ham.Description: A thick slice of ham glazed with sweet honey and cloves.
honey glazed ham.DisplayText: You consume the honey glazed ham. You feel revitalized and sturdy.
honey glazed ham.Name: Honey Glazed Ham

berserker brew.Description: A bubbling red liquid that steams when uncorked.
berserker brew.DisplayText: You chug the brew. A roar builds in your throat as your muscles expand!
berserker brew.Name: Berserker Brew

stale bread.Description: Hard as a rock and slightly moldy on one side.
stale bread.DisplayText: You gnaw on the stale bread. It's better than starving... barely.
stale bread.Name: Stale Bread

essence of turtle.Description: A thick, green syrup that moves slowly inside the bottle.
essence of turtle.DisplayText: You drink the essence. You feel slow, but incredibly tough.
essence of turtle.Name: Essence of Turtle

essence_of_bear.Description: A bubbling, dark brown liquid that smells faintly of pine and old fur.
essence_of_bear.DisplayText: You drink the essence. A primal roar escapes your throat. You feel unstoppable.
essence_of_bear.Name: Essence of Bear

essence_of_cheetah.Description: A vibrant orange fluid that seems to vibrate inside the glass.
essence_of_cheetah.DisplayText: You drink the essence. The world seems to slow down around you. You feel the need to run.
essence_of_cheetah.Name: Essence of Cheetah

essence_of_chameleon.Description: A strange clear syrup that takes on the color of whatever is behind it.
essence_of_chameleon.DisplayText: You drink the essence. You look down at your hands and can barely see them.
essence_of_chameleon.Name: Essence of Chameleon

essence_of_owl.Description: A dark blue liquid with suspended silver specks that look like stars.
essence_of_owl.DisplayText: You drink the essence. Your eyes widen and you can see clearly in the shadows.
essence_of_owl.Name: Essence of Owl

essence_of_armadillo.Description: A gray, chalky mixture that is difficult to swallow.
essence_of_armadillo.DisplayText: You drink the essence. Your skin hardens and feels like plate mail.
essence_of_armadillo.Name: Essence of Armadillo

moldy_cheese.Description: A wedge of yellow cheese covered in fuzzy blue spots. It smells sharp.
moldy_cheese.DisplayText: You hold your nose and swallow. It tastes awful, but it is calories.
moldy_cheese.Name: Moldy Cheese

dried_venison.Description: A strip of cured meat, tough as leather and very salty.
dried_venison.DisplayText: You chew for several minutes. It is tough, but makes you feel stronger.
dried_venison.Name: Dried Venison

crisp_apple.Description: A bright red fruit, shiny and free of blemishes.
crisp_apple.DisplayText: Crunchy, sweet, and refreshing. A simple delight.
crisp_apple.Name: Crisp Apple

iron_ration.Description: A dense block of hardtack and dried fruit wrapped in wax paper.
iron_ration.DisplayText: It is dry and tasteless, but it sits heavy in your stomach.
iron_ration.Name: Iron Ration

grandmothers_stew.Description: A sealed jar of thick broth containing root vegetables and tender beef.
grandmothers_stew.DisplayText: Warmth spreads through your limbs as you eat. You feel ready for anything.
grandmothers_stew.Name: Grandmother's Stew

hard_boiled_egg.Description: A chicken egg boiled until solid. The shell is cracked slightly.
hard_boiled_egg.DisplayText: A bit dry and chalky, but it is reliable protein.
hard_boiled_egg.Name: Hard Boiled Egg

rustic_bread_loaf.Description: A round loaf of dark bread with a thick, flour-dusted crust.
rustic_bread_loaf.DisplayText: Chewy and dense. It takes a lot of water to wash it down.
rustic_bread_loaf.Name: Rustic Bread Loaf

smoked_sausage.Description: A loop of cured meat in a casing. It smells of hickory smoke.
smoked_sausage.DisplayText: Greasy and savory. A favorite among soldiers.
smoked_sausage.Name: Smoked Sausage

raw_potato.Description: A lumpy, brown tuber covered in dirt.
raw_potato.DisplayText: Crunchy, starchy, and bland. Better than starving, but only just.
raw_potato.Name: Raw Potato

bottle_of_milk.Description: A glass bottle filled with fresh cow's milk.
bottle_of_milk.DisplayText: Cool and creamy. It coats your stomach pleasantly.
bottle_of_milk.Name: Bottle of Milk

bag_of_flour.Description: A heavy burlap sack that leaks a fine white dust whenever it is moved.
bag_of_flour.DisplayText: You cough as a cloud of white dust puffs up. It needs water and heat to be useful.
bag_of_flour.Name: Bag of Flour

banana_sock.Description: A stripey tube sock with a half-squashed banana stuffed inside the toe.
banana_sock.DisplayText: You swing the sock. It lands with a wet thud. The banana is now pudding.
banana_sock.Name: Banana Sock

spark_bolt.Description: A flickering mote of blue energy contained within a small glass vial.
spark_bolt.DisplayText: You shatter the vial! A bolt of static leaps from your fingers, crackling as it flies.
spark_bolt.Name: Spark Bolt

embershot.Description: A scorched piece of charcoal that stays warm to the touch.
embershot.DisplayText: You hurl a spark that blooms into a fist-sized fireball. It smells like a campfire.
embershot.Name: Embershot

mending_mist.Description: A small silk pouch filled with dried lavender and glowing fairy dust.
mending_mist.DisplayText: You squeeze the pouch, releasing a fragrant green mist that knits your wounds back together.
mending_mist.Name: Mending Mist

fire_ball.Description: A heavy glass sphere filled with swirling, angry orange smoke and a single flickering wick.
fire_ball.DisplayText: You shatter the glass! A roaring sphere of flame erupts, engulfing everything in a searing blast.
fire_ball.Name: Fireball

fire_bolt.Description: A crystal splinter that glows with an inner, pulsing orange light.
fire_bolt.DisplayText: You snap the crystal. A thin, concentrated needle of flame streaks toward your target.
fire_bolt.Name: Fire Bolt

ice_bolt.Description: A jagged icicle that never melts, even in direct sunlight.
ice_bolt.DisplayText: You hurl the icicle. It shatters against the target, blooming into a flash of freezing frost.
ice_bolt.Name: Ice Bolt

ice_wall.Description: A heavy, pulsating blue core that emits a constant trail of freezing vapor.
ice_wall.DisplayText: You slam the core into the ground. A jagged barrier of thick ice surges upward, blocking the path.
ice_wall.Name: Ice Wall

energy_shield.Description: A humming silver ring that vibrates when held near metal.
energy_shield.DisplayText: You twist the ring. A translucent geometric barrier shimmers into existence around you.
energy_shield.Name: Energy Shield

flash_bang.Description: A pressurized brass canister filled with magnesium powder and concentrated sunlight.
flash_bang.DisplayText: You pull the pin and toss the canister. A deafening CRACK is followed by a blinding white light!
flash_bang.Name: Flashbang

bag_of_sugar.DisplayText: You consume the sugar! You feel a sudden burst of energy, followed by a slight headache.
bag_of_sugar.Name: Bag_of_Sugar
